amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being available for the Huntsville Museum of Art in Huntsville, Alabama.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to limit the use of funds for the Huntsville Museum of Art in Huntsville, Alabama.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A021) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A021) Failed by voice vote.
